Package climatemonitoring.core.headless

Class Console

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.headless.Console
public class Console extends Object
Console is used to log messages or to request input from the user through the terminal. It is mainly used for a headless application
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
adellafrattina
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • setLogLevel

      public void setLogLevel(int level)

      To set the log level:

      DEBUG = all messages

      INFO = all messages, except DEBUG

      WARN = all messages, except DEBUG and INFO

      ERROR = all messages, except DEBUG, INFO and WARN

      DISABLE = to disable all messages

      Parameters:
      level - The log level

    • read

      public static String read(String str, String color)
      Reads the user input
      Parameters:
      str - A message to communicate to the user when requesting input
      color - The message color (RED, GREEN, YELLOW, BLUE, PURPLE, CYAN, WHITE)
      Returns:
      The user input

    • read

    • write

      public static void write(String str, String color)
      Writes a string to the console and creates a new line
      Parameters:
      str - The desired string
      color - The string color (RED, GREEN, YELLOW, BLUE, PURPLE, CYAN, WHITE)
